Episode.GuestStars: |Al Roker|Andrew Dits|Austin Iredale|Beau Baxter|Catherine LeFrere|Charles Everett|David Berman|Emma Faith Bullard|Fisher Stevens|Gary Littman|Genson Blimline|Harold Surratt|James David Rich|Joey Auzenne|Jon Collin Barclay|Jonathan Holtzman|Jordan Wiseley|Keith Brown|Kenya Brome|Laila Robins|Laura Sohn|Martin Fisher|Michael Medeiros|Michael Wetherbee|Peter Bradbury|Roy Jackson|Tom Wopat|Vinny DeGennaro|
Episode.Overview: As the Task Force investigates a kidnapping executed by seemingly impossible abductors, Dembe lands in a perilous situation. A recent health scare causes Red to think about a successor.
